name: Mind wanderer
description:
Its my first game and first game jam! I hope you have fun)

Controlls:

A - move left

D - move right

Space - JUMP!

Backspace - restart lvl!

Try to reach ghoal on the right side of the map! If you die - you can take over someone's mind.

Use the shovel to get through the rubble.

The guard cannot use a shovel!
